issue.title: com.dubox.drive
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dubox.drive

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

trk.svr-algorix.com
trk.rixengine.com
myaudioads.com

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.slashdot.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.slashdot.org%2F) ### Comment > Started happening approximately yesterday (Thursday 29th of November). > > Initially it would load the page and all css and styling and ads placement. After a few seconds the styling would stop working (looked like plain html). It would then present a dialog stating html-load.com was blocked and how to whitelist it. > > After resetting settings in AdGuard and turning off and on the filter lists the html-load.com issue resolved but the ads remained. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/j4lb2wo7uk0skckkww04c0ows0oowos59oy3n09ruc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/8wkngka9x0wss8ckcw8swgc8sgs4k4sg7t338d1ai8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.7 License type: | free DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection
